On Wednesday 1 October we will celebrate the Grand Opening
of the CCMI CDT from 2pm onwards. We will start with
a special invited colloquium by [Prof Tobias Weinzierl](https://www.durham.ac.uk/staff/tobias-weinzierl/) from the University of Durham, followed by an open reception.

If you would like to participate please register at [Eventbrite](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ccmi-opening-tickets-1636741069599?aff=oddtdtcreator).
